report.title: balanceDueList
report.sql: select member.last_name ,member.first_name ,member.address ,member.home_phone ,member.work_phone ,member.email ,sum(member_account.amount) balance from member, member_account where member.mbrid = member_account.mbrid group by member.last_name ,member.first_name ,member.address ,member.home_phone ,member.work_phone ,member.email
